name: Inside No. 9 (Series 3)
summary: 《9号秘事》第三季将于2016年底在BBC2台开播！这部以剧情反转著称的英剧是《疯城记》主创史蒂夫·佩姆伯顿与瑞斯·希尔史密斯的最新作品，自2014年开播之后广受剧迷追捧。在接受英媒采访时，佩姆伯顿透露第三季是“特别黑暗的一季，其中有两三集我们将恐怖惊悚元素推向了新高度。”这一季依然会由每集的独立故事组成，故事发生的位置总与9号有关，一座1978年的阿尔卑斯山小木屋、一间艺术馆与一家关门之后的餐馆成为第三季上演好戏的舞台。

eps.name: The Devil of Christmas
eps.desc:
Austria, Krampusnacht 1977. All the good children are given gifts by St Nicholas and all the bad ones are punished by the demonic Krampus. Julian (Pemberton) and Kathy (Jessica Raine) arrive for a holiday with their family. But who has been good and who has been bad?

Note: This episode is shot in the style of a 1970s programme. All but the opening and closing titles are shot in 4:3 aspect ratio using vintage PAL television cameras in a multiple-camera setup, with a few establishing shots taken from stock footage.

eps.name: The Bill
eps.desc: After a tiresome game of badminton a group of friends go for a night out at a local restaurant. They indulge in some tapas and a few drinks, which sounds like a lot of fun – but ultimately somebody has to pay the bill at the end of the night. What has started out as a pleasant evening ends with a shocking twist, as an argument about who is going to pick up the bill erupts – and then spirals out of control.

eps.name: The Riddle of the Sphinx
eps.desc: Nina (Alexandra Roach) thinks Professor Squires (Pemberton) has all the answers when, actually, neither has a clue what the future holds. They commence a battle of wits to solve a crossword puzzle and reveal the guardian of their fate. Dr Jacob Tyler (Shearsmith) joins the unravelling of the cryptic clues... but will they solve the riddle of the Sphinx?

eps.name: Empty Orchestra
eps.desc: What better way to celebrate Roger’s (Pemberton) promotion than a full-on, old-school karaoke session? An evening of hopes, dreams, intrigue, romance, betrayal and an awful lot of singing.

eps.name: Diddle Diddle Dumpling
eps.desc: Found. One black, man’s shoe. David and Louise’s world is changed forever by a seemingly random discovery in a local street.

eps.name: Private View
eps.desc: Fragments. A very special invitation to a private view of Elliot Quinn’s final exhibition of pieces at The Nine Gallery in East London. Champagne and Canapés…
